summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3678 , for the improvement of North and West 41st Street, from Palatine Avenue to 2nd Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45317 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
